project_short_description: Skeleton project created by Cookiecutter Kodexa Transformer Model

__prompts__.project_name: The name of the project for your transformer model
__prompts__.project_slug: The slug for your transformer model
__prompts__.pkg_name: The package name for your transformer model
__prompts__.version: The version for your transformer model
__prompts__.org_slug: The Kodexa organization slug you will host your transformer model in
__prompts__.taxonomy_ref: The taxonomy reference for your transformer model (this is the data definition that the data will be extracted to that you will use in your transformer)
